dotnetType.name: IntSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> (32-bit and smaller).

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" />
            is an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> with <see cref="P:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution.Size" /> less
            than or equal to 32; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> build
            result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
